titles.title: We Need To Have A High Perspective

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We need to have a high perspective
Of the life we life,
Getting our heads up out of the sand;
Living each day as the Father above
Has planned for us,
And rising above on eagle's wings.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We need to rise on eagle's wings;
Soaring over the earth in the heavenlies.
We need to rise on eagle's wings,
Getting the Father's perspective on life and things.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Living each day in the palm of the Father's hand,
Letting the Holy Spirit guide us in His ways.
Looking at each situation with God's divine insight,
And rising above on eagle's wings.
